members.name: isAwake
members.comment: Checks the current waking state of this bat. This does not imply any persistence of state past the method call.

return: true if the bat is awake or false if it is currently hanging from a block

members.name: setAwake
members.comment: This method modifies the current waking state of this bat. This does not prevent a bat from spontaneously awaking itself, or from reattaching itself to a block.
